title: Fullscript | Yin Qiao Formula
description: Yin Qiao Formula (or Honeysuckle and Forsythia Combination) is regarded as highly effective in immune system in traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). Devised
cleaned_text: Zone (MSRP) Yin Qiao Formula (or Honeysuckle and Forsythia Combination) is regarded as highly effective in immune system in traditional Chinese medicine (TCM). Devised almost 150 years ago, this herbal formula contains honeysuckle (flos preparatum, and licorice, a combination that has been historically documented and clinically proven as an immune enhancing formula*. Take four (4) softgel capsules each time, three (3) times daily, or as directed by your health practitioner. Serving Size: Four Softgels Amount Per Serving Honeysuckle Flower ... ... 2.88g Fineleaf Schizonepeta Herb 1.92g (Jing jie) Other Ingredients: Vegetable Oil, Gelatin, Glycerine. CAUTION If you are pregnant, or are taking any prescription drugs, consult your healthcare practitioner before using this product. Do not use if the tamper evident seal is broken or missing at the time of purchase. Cold Quell Blue Poppy 180 capsules (MSRP) Initial Defense Liquid Kan Herb Company (MSRP)
